Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 36th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1979...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Los Angeles on 3/2/1979 (Going to CHC: C R. Seilheimer. Going to LA: 2B J. Ray, C B. Schroeder)...
Injured on 6/20/1981 with a Broken Hand, out for 6 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1986, off Randy Jones (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/9/1986, off Randy Jones (CIN)...
Injured on 5/6/1989 with a Blurred Vision Eye, out for 2 weeks...
Injured on 10/3/1989 with a Broken Wrist, out for full season...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1989...
